copy the contents of /etc/apt/sources.list to http://paste.ubuntu.com/ and link the page it creates here.
open gedit from Applications -> Accessories, go to File -> Open, browse to /etc/apt/, and open sources.list. Select all, copy, paste into http://paste.ubuntu.com/.
